name: Prevenotics, Inc.
description: Developer of an AI medical diagnosis software designed to detect cancer or precancerous stages based on endoscopic data. The company's AI technology helps accurately diagnose cancer and predict conditions and diseases that can spread to cancer in advance, enabling patients in need of preventive management to actively manage their disease.
